text:
Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin appear on Bravo’s Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen and play ‘Never Have I Ever.’

The fourth season of Grace and Frankie is now streaming on Netflix and to celebrate, stars Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin appeared to play ‘Never Have I Ever.’ Cohen read a series of questions and the two actresses had to answer honestly.

Lily Tomlin is 78 years old and Jane Fonda is 80 years old. The two have been working on Grace and Frankie since 2015 and their appearance on Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen, we’re reminded of their precious friendship.
title: Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin Play ‘Never Have I Ever’ with Andy Cohen
